root.str: Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Slug Ammunition does increased damage at medium range, increasing accuracy and refire time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 64 missiles.
Speak to Representative Nalla at Nascent Expeditions on Sanctuary
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. All factions can use this gear.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. NC use only.
Apply the Digital Pumpkin camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Use the Warpgate Terminal to warp to a different continent
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 630 rounds.
Squad leader is dead, cannot deploy.
Enemy light assault in the area.
The G40 Grenade Launcher rapidly fires up to (6) 40mm grenades. The grenades do good damage to all targets.
This armor can only be worn by the NSO Light Assault.
Deadly in the hands of a skilled Infiltrator, the bolt action TSAR-42's features a unique bolt rotation system designed to improve the time between shots. TR use only.
Construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 180 seconds.
Increases the lock-on disruption to 12 seconds.
Apply the Temperate Chaparral camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Release a caustic cloud of smoke that is capable of harming soldiers in a 5 meter radius
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Gunner Kill Assist Share - Spitfire Turret
This customization adds a Dark Blue decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
Allows 2 additional grenades of any type to be carried.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Heavy Assault. NC use only.
Harasser Fury extended magazines have been refunded, and replaced with a two-rank version.
No previous or currently active battle stats for this region...
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Improved cruising and afterburner speed. (More effective than previous rank)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90 rounds.
Increases the braking performance of the Sunderer by 10%.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Listen, there's a catch. If you die or redeploy, that's it, done-zo. Getting a revive or going through a rebirth matrix will corrupt the data cache, and if you don't come out looking like a pile of goo, we'll have to do it all over again.
Earn Spawn experience to complete this directive.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Liberator by 450 seconds.

Killing 5 enemies without being spotted will decrease the visibility of your Infiltrator cloak by 75%. Being spotted or getting killed will reset this benefit. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 2.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
The XMG-100's large magazine and high rate of fire solidifies its use during close-to-medium range assault scenarios. NSO use only.
Armor and Vehicle decals awarded to Cobalt, champions of ServerSmash 2014!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1800 rounds.
Created for spec-ops missions where sniper rifles would prove unsuitable, the powerful semi-automatic Nyx VX31 scout rifle excels at medium range. VS use only.
Scorpion's payload no longer deals explosive damage, but will instead prevent vehicles within the blast radius from being repaired for 6 seconds.

The denizens of Sanctuary have decorated for a frightful October, and familiar faces have terrifying treats awaiting you. Speak with the various vendors on Sanctuary to learn more about what changes befall Auraxis during this holiday season.
Unlock Certifications for the Infiltrator's spec-ops tools. Tools can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Celebrate 18 years of PlanetSide with these limited-time offerings that call back to an earlier time.
Frag Ammunition has increased wounding capabilities at close range, dealing less direct damage and increased indirect damage.
Depending on the weapon, increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 5 or 10 standard size magazines.
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Attaches a 7x optical zoom to your weapon.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that our analysts attempted to locate Representative Foster, but the storm's energy caused sensor distortion. In order to get an accurate scan they need a powerful signal to hone in on.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
This armor can only be worn by the VS Heavy Assault.
You will face hundreds of enemies armed with thousands of ways to kill you.
Increases the overall handling of the vehicle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
The Harasser is a fast buggy with two extra passengers. It is ideal for small squad transportation and skirmishing. Drive this Harasser to the waypoint marked on your HUD.

Clear the waters with a loud declaration before splashing in or emit a sonar ping while stalking your enemies below the waves. This horn plays different sounds when above or below the water. NC use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a hood ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 189 rounds.
<font color="#7FF4FF">/who <playername search></font> - Searches for a specific player that is in game.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.
Capable ground vehicle terminals can now spawn Main Battle Tanks and capable air vehicle terminals can now spawn Liberators.
Further reduces the time to transition in and out of Sprint Mode.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 shells.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 38% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
Apply the single use Amerish Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Can carry an additional rocket of any type.
The outfit has been renamed to [*guild*].
Apply the Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "E" Gold Hood Ornament.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%

This is the tyrannical <font color="#FF574B">Terran Republic</font>. Their authoritarian regime seeks to maintain absolute control over the planet Auraxis and its people. They've imprisoned and even executed those they once vowed to protect.
It's the courteous thing to do. All factions can use this gear.
Contains the platinum NS-44P Commissioner, usable by all factions, and the TR specific TX1-FB Repeater.
Interact with the equipment terminal marked by your waypoint.
Apply the single use Amerish Grassland camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> Sorry, operative. I heard you talking to Nalla and I just don't have the time.
Apply the Shard camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Speak to Representative Foster on the Observation Deck on Sanctuary.
Apply the Red Giraffe camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Weapons in the shotgun family include semi-auto, pump, and full auto shotguns.
Empire Specific Fighters and Valkyrie Aircraft cost 30% less nanites when pulled from this facility.
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the aircraft.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Apply the single use Amerish Grassland camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
A heavier airframe but stronger engine provides improved vertical thrust, pitch manueverability, and agility.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Lion Head Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the India Scrub camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Make your presence known with this standard horn from Nanite Systems. NSO Use Only.
Contains Spartan armor for all non-MAX infantry classes.
Make sure to join the Outfit Wars and compete in the ultimate war of supremacy!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Air Officer:</font> Damage report. Secondary launch deck has sustained heavy damage.
This platinum variant of the remarkably accurate NS-15M LMG provides excellent sustained fire and above average projectile speed. All factions can use NS weapons.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly</font> Incoming orders, soldier. The eggheads have developed an experimental serum using those strange plants we've recovered from Esamir.
Adds a cosmetic attachment to your ANT. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Reduces camera shake from explosions by 40%, and flinch when struck by 65%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> There is nothing of note here either. Perhaps this was simply a waste of-- is that a keycard in the sand beside the shrine?
Allows for the creation of a single scythe aircraft in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
Transmission received. Updated destination for the next delivery.
Increases experience & resource gain by 30%. Boost can only be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Relics are activating and are not yet capturable.
Get a selection of Lightning weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price!
Unlock various upgrades for the Colossus Logistics slot. Logistics slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the braking performance of the Vanguard by 10%.
Perhaps I'm getting ahead of myself. Let's start with controlling the weather, shall we? Speak to Representative Ayla, we'd like to test our new Lightning Arrester in the field.
<font color="#7FF4FF">[/s]quadsay</font> - Sends a text message to your squad.

Trades 1 Polystellarite for 4 Synthium.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Return to Esamir when you are able, enlightened one. We have need of your skills.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300.
Apply the single use Indar Dry Brush camo pattern to your vehicle.
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Next Rank: Increase fuel regeneration. Fuel will recarge from zero to full in 30 seconds
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> The only damage I have seen is cosmetic. Enabling the diagnostics will reveal any damage that need manual repairs.
Corrupt data, please validate game files
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Survey area alpha located. While in the noted area, use the "aim" function of the Signal Scanner to deploy the relay.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rockets.
Improved hover, air brake, and vertical thrust.
Customize your Flash with this violet blinking antenna ball. TR use only.
Single Use Indar Scrub Armor Camo
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 25 meters.
Now that you are battle proven, your empire needs your --------------------------------------
Further increases the MAX's fire rate while in Overdrive.
Allows soldiers to carry 3 additional magazines for primary and sidearm weapons, and increases reload speed by 15% for weapons in those slots.
Restocks one tick of ammunition for all infantry weapons and the weapons of nearby vehicles you own every 110 seconds.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 11 minutes.
Built off of the Pulsar assault rifle, the long-range Darkstar was named after the notorious squad of designated marksman medics that popularized its use.
Hardlight projection technology provides the same defensive qualities as standard issue equipment, but with natural comfort and mobility. NC use only.
The Wayland Long Range Optic is easily configured for various magnifications. This optic amplifies magnification by 10x.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 5, and slightly increases weapon equip time.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "6" Gold Hood Ornament.
Tool: Rocket Launcher: T2 Striker AE
TR: Customization - Rocket Launcher Decimator Promo
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Scythe's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 10 KPH.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. VS use only.
The Slicer GD-25 was designed as a light weapon capable of accurate aimed and hip fire.
Overload detected in spawn control unit.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
NC: MAX: Defensive: Extra Ammo 3 Description
You're leaving the designated combat area!
White Lumifiber Tiger Trim for the Valkyrie. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster: </font> Well done, operative. We ca... ... to the lab.... analysis.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Increases Magburner's recharge speed by 27% and allows horizontal mobility while thrusters are active.
Creates a laser grid overhead that will severely injure enemy infantry that pass through it.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this decal.

MAX suits are specialized combat armor that gives heavy armor and access to devastating weapons. What they gain in power they lose in mobility. MAX suits can be repaired by ally engineers. A MAX can be revived by ally medics when they have fallen in battle.

This Auraxium-clad variant of the TX1 Repeater is a replica of former Terran Republic President Connery's weapon of choice. Equipped with a special suppressor, this silenced pistol remains effective even at longer ranges.

<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Facilitator Campner. Overheard discussing an old Earth game called. Black discs. Red discs. Physical representation. Representative Ayla excels at obtaining such objects. Interaction suggested.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Harasser by 480 seconds.
Constructs a fortified bunker with firing areas for infantry.
Earn a Silver Medal on 5 different weapons.

The mark of a highly regarded soldier, the Vanu Sovereignty only offers the Auraxium Force Blade to their most capable warriors. Much like its standard-issue version, contact with the blade is incredibly damaging to human tissues.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shells.
Originally reserved for members of Nomad, the Gladius is the hardest hitting SMG ever designed. NC use only.
Applies a Beta decal to your vehicle.
The Air to Air Missiles are ideal for engaging enemy aircrafts. This weapon does require a lock-on before they can be fired.
Kill enemies with The Slasher knife while wearing a Halloween mask.
An advanced on-board computer compensates for the minor movements while aiming down sights, effectively eliminating scope sway for the marksman.
This 4th Anniversary Edition of the SMG-46 Armistice submachine gun features an extremely fast rate of fire. TR use only.
The M30 Mustang Air Hammer fires a barrage of explosive rounds with each shot which are deadly to enemy infantry and lightly armored vehicles. NC use only.
NS35 Frag Cannon Left Gold Medal
Adds custom hubcaps to your Sunderer. NSO use only.
You automatically repair 7% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Sunderer.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Hello, operative. Bring the Tempest Shield along, as it will prove necessary for what we are to do next.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
The accurate Warden semi-automatic battle rifle is effective at stopping infantry far past the typical LMG or carbine. NC use only.
Good as new. The repair tool can fix most mechanical objects, like vehicles, generators, and MAX units. Now use the terminal to acquire a Sunderer.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%
Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 8 seconds.
Attaches a 1.5x optical zoom to your weapon.
Holographic laser reflex sight designed to create a lightweight, yet accurate, sight

The cataclysm that resulted in The Shattered Warpgate also birthed a genesis of new flora in the surrounding region. One of the new species of plant life, notable for its warm effervescent radiance, warranted further study. Samples of these glowing tuberous roots were taken to Biolabs across Auraxis for analysis. While research efforts have been slow, thanks to the efforts of saboteurs on all sides, eventually breakthroughs were made.
Allows use of an infrared night vision scope.
NC: MAX: Flame 01: Right Gold Medal
Cloaking and Decloaking no longer create a sound.
Enabling a colorblind filter modifies the color of 3d space
Light Assault is a close-to-medium range skirmisher. It has a jetpack for extreme mobility and can quickly flank enemy positions.

While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 35 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 120 seconds, three can be carried.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The crystals displaced by the Elysium Drills are quite valuable. Locate a drill planetside, operative, and either use the NE-11 PML to break down the crystals or eliminate nearby enemies who may seek to do the same.
Increases resource gain by 50% for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Are you sure you want to use this implant charger?
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Cannot invite [*target*] to your squad because it is full.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Next rank increase cloaked recharge rate and time cloak can remain active when stationary: Completely drained energy recharges in 14 seconds. Cloak can remain active while moving for 15 seconds.
<font color="#7FF4FF">/joinchannel</font> - Allows you to join a chat channel you have already left. e.g. Yell

Researchers theorize that Esamir's recently exposed World Anchor may connect to a location off-world, either for the purposes of communication or translocation. In order to determine the location, Nanite Systems will first require a specialized cryptographic key; a subspace cipher. Representative Foster reluctantly enlists the aid of FL-34 to procure the coded data.
Failed to remove the squad from the platoon.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Increases the ANT's health pool by 10%.
Earn Transport Kill Assists while piloting a Galaxy/Valkyrie in a storm.
Increases the speed at which your shields regenerate to full by 50%.
Visit the Black Market vendors on Sanctuary
Retrieve energy readings from an Amp Station console found on Hossin (using the Analysis HUD implant can help locate the correct terminal)
Delay until auto repair kicks in reduced by 1 second.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Increases the power of the Nanite Proximity Repair System by 500%.
Allows the user to carry two additional Rocklet Rifle magazines.
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Grants access to grenades which simulate the sound of weapons fire, project false radar signatures, and fool automated anti-infantry turrets.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Adds the Combustion Intake to the Galaxy.
Unlock various gadgets for the Flash ATV's utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Unlocks the NSX Fujin throwing knife for all classes, available as a grenade alternative.
JOIN OR CREATE AN OUTFIT TO ACCESS THE ARMORY
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.48 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 6.25%
Air vehicles can resupply at vehicle resupply pads.
Single Use Arid Forest Armor Camo
Increases the weapon's total ammunition capacity.
I see you, good stuff. Bonus paycheck headed your way sooner or later. Still more to do though, get back out there.
Enables mouse movement acceleration to smooth raw mouse movements
The traditional second anniversary gift is cotton, but that's lame so we got you this.

The rail mounted Darklight Flashlight can illuminate hostile cloaked infiltrators and dark areas but the light can give away your position.

The light can be turned on and off with Toggle Attachment.
Improve the look of your Sunderer with this custom grill. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Get a selection of items to outfit your Heavy Assault trooper at a discounted price!
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 680 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.24 seconds.
Allows cortium to be used to create a garage suitable for protecting a deployed Sunderer. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 15%
Wearable by all non-Max classes. All factions can use this gear.
This black, right-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.
Placeholder display string for WDS win reward description
The M202 Wyrm wing-mounted machine guns fire slow, high-damage rounds most effective against heavily armored land and air vehicles.
Adds gravity distorting particle trails to the vehicle's wheels. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
High Velocity Ammunition increases the weapon's projectile velocity by 10% and minimum damage range by 20 meters, but reduces the weapon's maximum damage range by 2 meters.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Curious. Power was clearly ineffecient to assemble your aircraft. This reveals the general location for the researcher who fled the flooded base. And that location is on Oshur. Take to the skies and find them.
<font color="#FF0000">This charger cannot be used because its charge would surpass maximum charge capacity.</font>
Additional reduction to the spawn timer on the squad Spawn Beacon.
Deploys a dampening field that reduces common explosive damage by 50% for allied infantry and MAX units within range. Only one Ordnance Dampener can be active at a time.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside.
<font color="#7FF4FF">/squad invite <playername></font> - Invites another player to your squad.
Symbiotic Healing Modules interface with Medical Applicators to restore health to both the user and the target.
This gold right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 9 rockets.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1 missile.
Squad: Hack 100 facilities while in a Squad
Increases the MAX's jump height and melee recovery speeds at the expense of reduced armor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 rounds.
Increases the yaw rate of the Scythe by 8 degrees/second.
The Heavy Assault class has access to a variety of anti-aircraft rocket launchers.

Designed with mobility in mind, the lightweight alloys that make up Auraxis Firearm's AF-A4 Bandit allows for faster movement while aiming without compromising on stopping power in close to medium ranges.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Scythe. VS use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Bull Horns Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Single Use Indar Canyons v1 Vehicle Camo
Apply the Circuit Board pattern to your vehicle.
Increases the total durability of the vehicle.
The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. All factions can use this weapon.
Are you to be bested by this rabble?
Hold down the quick knife button to equip the knife after the attack.
Single Use Indar Savanna Weapon Camo
Single Use Pine Forest Armor Camo

When this sticky grenade is thrown during an Electrical Storm, it will create the conditions for a lightning strike at its location.

Has no effect when thrown outside of an Electrical Storm. Takes 6 seconds for a bolt to manifest.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Increases the amount of health regenerated
Adds 4 rockets to the default magazine size.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 1.33% every 1 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Increases the range and duration that soldiers can be resupplied by the ammunition pack
NC - Shared - Heavy Pistol - V4 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Contains HL4 Sigma Armor for all non-MAX infantry classes.
Gear up and get back into the fight with this limited time bundle. Contains equivalent weapons and cosmetics for NC, TR, and VS. Boost is granted only to the character that purchases the bundle.
Increasing this slider to the right will increase the angle that the heads up display draws at. (Default: 100.00)
Decreases the time taken to reload the weapon by 20%.
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 2 minutes.
Apply the Flame camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Kills and revives restore 23% of your Nano-Regen Device energy. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
VS: Vehicle - Customization - Snake Decal Promo
Reduces the nanite cost of Flash and Javelin by 50% and Harasser by 20%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
We need more squad leaders to organize the chaos of the battlefield. As squad leader, take charge and earn experience supporting your squadmates.
Tracking this Directive will un-pin your currently tracked Mission. Are you sure?
The outfit has been renamed to [*guild*].

Awarded for mastery of the Harasser, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a badge of honor for the owner's offroad achievements. NSO only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trim changes based on your current faction.</font>
Deposit Cortium into the Silo to make sure the Silo is active.
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 6 minutes; also increases the radius in which the pack will resupply ammo to 7 meters.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon, or vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Steel Rain: Squad members (not in vehicles) will redeploy into drop pods in #count([*seconds*])
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
Apply the Yellow Chrome camo pattern to your vehicle.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Apply the Gear camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.

Light Assaults have several types of jet packs available for traversing over high obstacles, remaining in air for extended periods of time, or gaining a quick burst of speed. The Light Assault can fire weapons while airborne, but with an accuracy penalty.

The standard Terran Republic frag grenade, capable of heavily damaging infantry targets.

3 second fuse.

The New Conglomerate's holographic Hardlight Dagger continually maintains the blade to keep itself sharp. Tapering down to only a few molecules at the edge of the blade, it can cut through body armor with ease.
Earn a Silver Medal on 3 different carbines.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Bundle full of auraxium weapons for testing purposes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rounds.
You've been removed from the squad leader command channel.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Unfortunately, with the ongoing war, construction has been slow going. Our only option is to continue despite this, and hope that the greater good will overcome the pedantic nature of each empire. No offense.
Upon activation the MAX is anchored to the ground, increasing fire rate, reload speed, and projectile speed by between 35%-50% depending on the weapon system.
Adds blue chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. NC use only.
Adds cosmetic plating to the cockpit area. NC use only.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 21 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Reduces damage taken from small arms, and heavy machine guns, gatling guns, aircraft noseguns, and anti-aircraft machineguns by 20%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> First is a Deliverer Prototype with a built-in vehicle ammo dispenser. The other is a Lodestar Prototype with four mounted heavy machine guns and a suite of defensive options. Each with AMS technology.
